name: skill-share-hub
description: A SaaS knowledge spaces platform where creators can monetize knowledge through premium content and real-time Q&A sessions.

scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=@skill-share-hub/types && npm run build --workspace=@skill-share-hub/ui && npm run build --workspace=api && npm run build --workspace=web
scripts.test: npm run test --workspace=api && npm run test --workspace=web && npm run test --workspace=@skill-share-hub/types && npm run test --workspace=@skill-share-hub/ui
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck --workspace=api && npm run typecheck --workspace=web && npm run typecheck --workspace=@skill-share-hub/types && npm run typecheck --workspace=@skill-share-hub/ui
scripts.clean: npm run clean --workspace=@skill-share-hub/types && npm run clean --workspace=@skill-share-hub/ui && npm run clean --workspace=api && npm run clean --workspace=web
scripts.ci:typecheck: npm run db:generate && npm run typecheck
scripts.ci:test: npm run db:generate && npm run test
scripts.ci:build: npm run db:generate && npm run build
